DOC.brief_title: Electronic Cigarettes ( E-cigarettes ) Harm Reduction Strategy
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study two-arm , randomize control trial . The investigator randomize 40 participant intervention arm . Participants randomize one two arm : e-cigarettes nicotine cartridge e-cigarettes placebo cartridge ( 0mg ) . Participants research assistant blind allocation nicotine placebo e-cigarettes difference appearance odor mist emit e-cigarettes without nicotine containing cartridge . Participants ask track nicotine use via text message . All participant receive 20-30 minute behavioral counseling consultation train tobacco counselor . Counselors review participant 's smoking pattern offer tailor behavioral environmental change strategy include specific smoke reduction strategy option . Participants give supply e-cigarettes follow 3 week
